title: Contextual Learning Process Based on Modified Jigsaw for Understanding Basic Physics Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of High School-Level Basic Physics Concepts
context.additional_context: Physics pedagogy emphasizing practical applicability for pre-service/in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the experimental design and data interpretation process of physics concepts using the modified jigsaw method.
Learners can develop a contextual learning model that connects everyday life examples to physics principles.
Learners can visually represent physics concepts using online lab simulations and digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
